info.description:
This API allows access to SuperOn's e-commerce platform.
This API will evolve incrementaly under this major version maintaining backward compatibility. That means that new keys may be added to the objects bellow and you should foresee that. The object keys, once provided, won't be removed or have their type modified in the same major API version.
For more information about SuperOn, see http://lifeapps.com.br/superon or send us a message at contato@lifeapps.com.br.
info.title: SuperOn API

get.description: Returns orders in the state "Ready to Deliver"

post.description: Provides batch update for prices on a certain supplier

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A batch for price update. This should contain at least one item. This is an async operation and will process in some moment in the future.

ok.description: Will return "true" once the batch has been accepted for processing. This is processing is asyncronous/non-blocking

idorder.description: A UUID that identifies this order

products.description: List of products that compose this order

notes.description: An arbitrary non mandatory note about this price update

internalcode.description: A product internal code. This exists for products that do not have a common barcode

availablefororder.description: Determines if this product should be made available for final consumers (true) or if it should be hidden and made unavailable until further updates

PriceBatchItemRequest.description: Represents a price update for that product. Send EITHER the internalcode or the barcode. If a product has a barcode, that should be used.
